name: Secret Delivery
description:
Secret Delivery

[This game was originally released 24 Dec 2016, This is the description from then:] I'm continuing the tradition of making a brand new game every December. Except this time, I spent less time and effort.
I still think it turned out fine though.

HOW TO PLAY
You play as some red-hatted guy and your goal is to deliver presents to all 6 homes without getting seen.
Move with arrow keys
Run by holding left shift
Place presents by pressing space when a tree is in front of you.

M to mute

Credits
Pretty much everything is by me
Music from 8bit Universe
Most sprites edited from pokemon.

Happy Holidays
